official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the rate of tax on capital gains for individuals and corporations.
short_title: Capital Investment Tax Incentive Act of 1980

summary.text: Capital Investment Tax Incentive Act of 1980 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the deduction for net capital gain from 60 to 70 percent in the case of individual taxpayers. Reduces the capital gains tax rate for corporations from 28 to 21 percent.
